Other.errormessage: Please download the jdbc driver of database, and put the .jar file into [The install directory of raqsoft]/common/jdbc directory.

ORACLE.errormessage: Please download the jdbc driver of oracle database, and put the .jar file into [The install directory of raqsoft]/common/jdbc directory. The reference URL is http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/database/features/jdbc/index-091264.html.

MS_SQL_Server.errormessage: Please download the jdbc driver of SQL Server database, and put the .jar file into [The install directory of raqsoft]/common/jdbc directory. The reference URL is http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/resultsForCategory.aspx?displaylang=en&categoryId=3&stype=n_dc

Sybase.errormessage: Please download the jdbc driver of Sybase database, and put the .jar file into [The install directory of raqsoft]/common/jdbc directory. The reference URL is http://www.sybase.com/products/allproductsa-z/softwaredeveloperkit/jconnect

Access.errormessage: Please download the jdbc driver of Access database, and put the .jar file into [The install directory of raqsoft]/common/jdbc directory.

IBM_DB2.errormessage: Please find the jdbc driver of DB2 database from [The install directory of DB2]/sqllib/java, and put the .jar file into [The install directory of raqsoft]/common/jdbc directory.

My_SQL.errormessage: Please download the jdbc driver of MYSQL database, and put the .jar file into [The install directory of raqsoft]/common/jdbc directory. The reference URL is http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/connector/j/5.0.html

HSQL.errormessage: Please download the jdbc driver of HSQL database, and put the .jar file into [The install directory of raqsoft]/common/jdbc directory. The reference URL is http://hsqldb.org

TERADATA.errormessage: Please download the jdbc driver of TERADATA database, and put the .jar file into [The install directory of raqsoft]/common/jdbc directory. The reference URL is http://downloads.teradata.com/download/connectivity/jdbc-driver

POSTGRES.errormessage: Please download the jdbc driver of Postgres database, and put the .jar file into [The install directory of raqsoft]/common/jdbc directory. The reference URL is http://www.postgresql.org/download

DBOne.errormessage: Please download the jdbc driver of DBOne database, and put the .jar file into [The install directory of raqsoft]/common/jdbc directory.
